name: Lock-Up Dungeon
description:
The minotaur's maze has been opened, and it falls to you to to lock it up tight! Rush through 3 levels. A browser arcade game.

   

X - Rush forward unstoppably. Makes you temporarily invincible, until you hit a wall.

WASD or Arrow keys - Move around

     made with wickeditor by perebite!
